abstrac: Where does your next open door lead?
bio:
We started as many small businesses, from a passion. In our case, the passion comes from wanting to improve workplaces based on many years of experience across industries and organizations. We believe that the way work is done today can be better for organizations, business owners and leaders, and for workers. 

Our approach is simple: we study and use science across many fields to understand people and organizations, especially focused on what is best for people to help them reach their highest performance. We use the findings to identify solutions and support everything we do to help reduce stress, increase productivity, increase satisfaction and contentment, improve engagement and commitment, and overall produce better work.  

The commitment we make to every client is that we will never try to sell something or offer something that is not the right solution, and never more than necessary. Our goal is to find the best, easiest way to provide you with the outcome you desire in the least amount of time, at the best price point we can. We want yo provide the best services for the value. Period. We believe everyone should have access to these types of tools and services, no matter the size or revenue of the organization.

Want to see how we can help you and your organization? Contact us today for a quote or more information, and find out where your next open door leads!

abstrac: Engaging and creative writing that delivers a vision to each member of our audience.
bio:
Hello! I would like to introduce myself to you. My name is R.Kimberly and I am a professional writer.   I have been in love with the literary arts since I was a little girl. As a reader , I was able to be transported to so many wonderful places. As a writer I am able to create thoughtful memories and relate to each reader.
My writing reflects a lot of my personality. I infuse my interests with a bit of humor and my experiences with learned knowledge and empathy.I enjoy captivating my audience with charming pieces and informational integrity.
I have a background in management and trouble shooting.I have a strong fiscal acumen and have created several training programs for management and staff.  I have written motivational speeches for private and public organizations and am also working on a three book series.
I hold several interests. Holistic Healing, Health awareness, Child care, household topics, self help and healing, relationships, business, Metaphysical arts,imaginative creation , budgeting and fiction genres.
I look forward to hearing from you!
Kindest Regards,
R.Kimberly

I am available days and evenings. The rate of pay is dependant on the project.  
I am able to communicate however my client feels most comfortable .
I have a short turn around time and am able to produce results effectively.

abstrac: With this little light: Create, Re-create, renovate, re-vibrate; be happy and be safe In Your Space...
bio:
I have always been keen on the value of a great space and the impact it can have on the psyche.  From modeling in fashion shows and doing theater productions early on I developed a love of environments and how they can become transformed especially by light. 

I am a trained designer who has worked with a few firms like Gruen Associates, Douglas Stanton Architects, VaughnBenz-a furniture design/manufacturer; from the capacity of project coordinator to design associate to assistant creative director.

My love of architecture and specifically interior architectural design has taken me on many journeys and adventures.  As as designer I believe in shining my designer light so as to bring about a heightened sense of wellness, of sanctuary in one's space whichever space it is.  I believe and know that when one feels better they do better. My desire is to help facilitate that for my clients while also helping them to live in a sustainable, high vibration, low footprint environment!
Terms are subject to type/scope of project.  Prefer email contact initially. If contracted for work direct number will be provided.
